title: Cauliflower Tomato 🍅 Curry | Side Dish
content:
Side dish: Cauliflower Tomato 🍅 Curry  Servings: 4 Duration: 15 minutes  A short and quick recipe which is cauliflower curry combined with onion, tomatoes and other Indian spices. I suggest this curry can serve with many breakfast and lunch recipes they are phulka, chapathi, rice, Puri , Jeera rice or Mixed vegetables Pulao. It is a quick and easy curry recipe, I just love it. Let’s start with Ingredients and follows Procedure Ingredients:
  • Cauliflower florets - 1/2 kg - 500 gms
  • Onion - medium sized - 1 - Finely chopped
  • Tomatoes 🍅- 2 - medium sized - Finely chopped
  • Coriander leaves - 1/3 cup - chopped- garnish
  • Oil - 2 Tb sp
  • Ginger-Garlic Paste - 1/2 Tb sp
  • Cumin seeds - 1/2 Tb sp
  • Red chilly powder - 1/2 Tb sp
  • Coriander Powder - 1 Tb sp
  • Salt - 1 tsp
  • Turmeric Powder - 1/4 tsp
  • Garam Masala Powder - 1/2 tsp
Procedure:
  • Heat skillet pan over medium heat
  • Add oil & cumin seeds
  • Let them splutter then add Ginger-Garlic Paste along with finely chopped onion
  • Mix well & Saute 2 mins
  • Next Add chopped tomatoes 🍅, Mix well & cook 3 minutes
  • Then add salt, red chilly powder, Garam masala powder, coriander powder & turmeric powder
  • Combine well and add cauliflower florets along with water
  • Mix well & cover with lid for 5 minutes
  • Remove lid and mix well. Let it cook till water evaporates( it takes around 5 minutes)
  • Turn off heat and garnish with chopped cilantro
  • Mix well & serve with Chapathi/ Roti
  • Happy cooking and enjoy your day 😃
